StiTrackContainer.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 //StiTrackContainer.h
00002 //M.L. Miller (Yale Software)
00003 //05/01
00004 
00005 /*
00006   
00007   StiTrackContainer is meant to provide the interface between the StiTracker and the persistency model.
00008   That is, StiTrackContainer will be the only thing that StiTracker will have to know about and
00009   StiTrackContainer will interface to (most likely) StEvent, unless we decide to make StiTrackContainer
00010   persistent.
00011 
00012   For now, we store pointers to StiTracks in a member vector ("has a vector") instead of publicly
00013   inheriting from vector ("is a vector").
00014 
00015   Implemented as a singleton
00016   
00017 */
00018 
00019 #ifndef StiTrackContainer_HH
00020 #define StiTrackContainer_HH
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 using std::vector;
00024 
00025 class StiTrack;
00026 
00027 class StiTrackContainer
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     typedef vector<StiTrack*> stitrackvec;
00031 
00032     friend class nobody;
00033     
00034     //Singleton access
00035     static StiTrackContainer* instance();
00036     static void kill();
00037 
00038     //Mimic STL interface
00039     void push_back(StiTrack*);
00040     void clear();
00041     void clearAndDestroy();
00042     unsigned int size() const;
00043 
00044     //Iterator bounds, etc
00045     stitrackvec::const_iterator begin() const;
00046     stitrackvec::const_iterator end() const;
00047     
00048     stitrackvec::const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const;
00049     stitrackvec::const_reverse_iterator rend() const;
00050     
00051 protected:
00052     StiTrackContainer();
00053     virtual ~StiTrackContainer();
00054 
00055 private:
00056     static StiTrackContainer* sinstance;
00057     stitrackvec mvec; 
00058 };
00059 
00060 #endif
